attributes.action: List female garments that are legally deemed to be an indicator of consent.
attributes.background: Following the presentation of a "thong" as evidence of consent in a rape trial in Ireland, the UK Government must act to inform its citizens precisely which items of female apparel express sexual consent so that we do not risk succumbing to a similar experience in our own legal process.

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about the evidence that can be considered during rape trials. However, we are not sure exactly what change you would like to see.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/227191
